Summary: Decent Budget Option for Dog Food
text: I know that the trend is to feed dogs increasingly sophisticated and expensive foods, including home cooked options and raw, but for some of us the budget is still not there to "go organic" for ourselves, let alone for the household mutt. For us, Purina Beneful is a decent option. It's not optimal nutrition or high tech, but your dog will probably eat it and be just fine. Our dog is small (about 9 lbs) and has no trouble with the size of the kibble in this variety. And a bag this size lasts quite a while. Ideally we could all eat like kings, even dogs, but until then, this is a reasonable, practical solution to "what to feed the dog?"
